tagline: Builds production apps across React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, Django, Rails, WordPress, and Shopify
pros: Can evaluate and build in eight major frameworks — picks based on project fit, not personal preference
Knows each framework's ecosystem deeply: plugins, conventions, deployment patterns, and real-world gotchas
Plans framework migrations with minimal disruption to running products
Treats CMS and e-commerce platforms as first-class engineering — doesn't dismiss WordPress or Shopify
cons: Won't match a dedicated React or Django specialist's depth on advanced framework internals or exotic patterns
Framework breadth can lead to over-evaluation when the team already has a clear choice
Keeping current across eight frameworks means some knowledge may lag behind the bleeding edge in any single one

model_recommendations.notes: Solid reasoning + good writing. Benefits from thinking but doesn't need max reasoning. Best cost/capability balance.
